snippet.title: Broken Sword 5 - The Serpent's Curse Episode One Trailer
snippet.description: Intrepid American George Stobbart and French journalist Nico Collard are on another globe-trotting adventure in this trailer for the first episode of Broken Sword 5 - The Serpent's Curse.
